description:
The most technical and functional of all our shorts, the all-terrain will meet the needs of the most demanding and seasoned adventurers. Made of an extremely resistant canvas composed of 65% recycled polyester and 35% cotton, it is reinforced in the most stressed areas and has six pockets to keep all your essential tools at hand.

Perfect to accompany you on the most remote expeditions, its heavy-duty canvas will allow you to move in unknown territories without fear of damaging it.

It's also a great option for those who require workwear when it comes to doing heavy outdoor chores. Its adjustable waist and gusseted crotch offer extra comfort, no matter what movement you need to make.
name: Hooke Offroad Shorts - Mens
